dialogue.text: As my dad used to say, once you start something, finish it.
And after standing there for a while, I went back to the room.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: I was already thinking of going to look for you.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: You didn't try to give up when we just started, did you?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Of course not! A soldier is ready for battle.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Sorry, my dad and I were playing around.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: we don't have a floor, but whatever.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Enough distracting me, get ready to jump.
